title: WATCH | Truck ploughs into at least 20 parked cars at KZN mall
text:
Two trucks collided head-on and a third was pushed off the road from Bethel to Kriel in Mpumalanga. Dashcam footage shows the chaotic scene. WATCH. WATCH

Police have registered a case of reckless and negligent driving after a truck driver lost control and crashed into about 20 cars parked at the Flanders Mall in Mount Edgecombe, KwaZulu-Natal, on Thursday evening. (Arrive Alive, Twitter)

Police have opened a case of reckless and negligent driving after a truck driver lost control and crashed into about 20 cars parked at Flanders Mall in Mount Edgecombe, KwaZulu-Natal, on Thursday evening.

CCTV footage of the incident showed the truck veering off the M41 and colliding into multiple vehicles in the parking lot of the mall.

"The driver of the truck sustained injuries and was taken to hospital," said police spokesperson Captain Nqobile Gwala.

According to Netcare 911 spokesperson Shawn Herbst, two other people also sustained minor injuries.

"All the patients were treated on scene and transported by ambulance to hospital for further treatment," Herbst said in a statement.
description: Police have opened a case of reckless and negligent driving after a truck driver lost control and crashed into about 20 cars parked at Flanders Mall in Mount Edgecombe, KwaZulu-Natal. Watch.
